=== Meeting summary ===

==== Cherry-picking Xfce 4.11 components ====
The discussion about "Cherry-picking Xfce 4.11 components" started at 22:40.

** New Xfce 4.11 features to be dropped into 14.04: GTK3 indicator support, new xfdesktop release
** Xfce 4.12 will be backported to Trusty if enough testing resources are available
** ''LINK:'' https://bugzilla.xfce.org/show_bug.cgi?id=9963 
** Xfce power manager doesn't support systemd; we want a patch for that if at all possible
** ''ACTION:'' team to investigate patching xfce4-power-manager or finding alternatives
** it would be great if users could help wth translations for light-locker here: https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/light-locker/
** for info or assistance on the translations (about 10 strings) or transifex, feel free to ping ochosi on freenode.org
** Other new components to drop for 14.04: light-locker, MenuLibre, Mugshot
** ''ACTION:'' micahg to talk to barry about python2.7/3 situation
** ''ACTION:'' micahg to upload whiskermenu to xfce PPAs
** ''LINK:'' https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Xubuntu/Roadmap/Specifications/Trusty/CommunityWallpapers 
** ''ACTION:'' ochosi announces the community wallpapers project on the mailing list
